author: Matt Cohen
comment: I found this app through reddit. I searched Google Play for 'wear d20' and 'wear dice' and this never showed up in the results. Definitely try to figure out what's causing that because I figure this would have way more downloads if people could find it easier. Also, please add support for Android Wear 5.1's always on feature so I don't have to keep relaunching the app every time my watch screen times out. It also crashes every now and then on my Moto 360 running 5.1. Also please add an option to tap to roll
title: Great Start - Here's some feedback

author: Collin Lorenzo
comment: Hedra is the only Wear Compatible Polyhedral Dice App on the market. Definitely worth the premium, and then some. I would buy this app 5 times just to support the developer/s. You guys are on point. I don't use the tactile response, but love that it's an option. Keep up the good work!
title: Great App

author: Garrett Jones
comment: Well Done! This is exactly what I was looking for. Super good looking on the 360. I love the marble look to the die, but could you add more colors please? I'm would love a deep green!
title: Very cool, and worth the money!

author: Philipp Dopichaj
comment: Initially, it wouldn't work at all, but reinstalling seems to have fixed this.

reply.author: MrPendulum
reply.content:
Hi Phillip,

I'm sorry this has happened. I've tested a few situations and can't seem to recreate this. At what stage is this occurring? What version OS is your watch running? Original G Watch, or the G Watch R? Do you get the same crash on the phone version of the app? 

Feel free to email me the details, and I will happily try to correct this.
